original_text:
“If my people would only listen to me,
    if Israel would only follow my ways,
korean_text: 내 백성아 내 말을 들으라 이스라엘아 내 도를 따르라

sentences.original_text: If my people would only listen to me,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 나의 백성이 나만 듣기만 한다면,

sentences.original_text: if Israel would only follow my ways,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 이스라엘이 나의 길만 따르기만 한다면,
